this_title: Deep Dreaming Flowers to AltAir V.2
introduction: Deep Dreaming Flowers is a recording of a live signal analog video/audio synthesizer performance with a voiced narration made in collaboration with an AI program. A speculative machine-guided psychedelic broadcast of an astral floral projection. A fictional telepathic transmission that saturates the boundaries of perception with interlacing signals of interconnected consciousness.
chinese_title: Deep Dreaming Flowers to AltAir V.2
